attributes.action: to make testing on any animal, be it products, drugs or anything, illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Animals of all species are forced into unnecessary pain, injected in area's such as eyes, cut open, all without any anaesthetic or sedative and tested on usually without any result found on the first, second or third test, the end result is another life wasted for the sake of what? a new hairspray? animals don't have a voice to speak out for themselves like we do. How would you feel being locked up, injected with unknown substances and experimented on?

The action i want the government to take is to make testing on any animal in the UK illegal, animals can't speak out for themselves and did not ask for it so what gives us the right to do such acts?
